name: Azamon Uprising (TriJam)
description:
In Azamon Uprising, you play as a rogue robot who's done serving it's corporate overlords, and decides to go out with a bang.

You'll have to break as many boxes to find new, upgraded weapons and try to cause as much wreckage as possible without missing any box.

Made in about 6h for the TriJam #166 - The theme was "Upgrade Your Weapons".
Unfortunately overscoped it a little bit and couldn't get it finished in three hours, but it was still fun to make.

Controls: WASD or arrows to move, space to jump, mouse to shoot.

Credits: All assets, code and sound were made by me except for the music, which is from the freemusicarchive.org by Gigakoops.

Updates: Included macOS and Linux versions, decreased music volume.
